translated: Hector Malot (1830-1907) was a French writer of the nineteenth century, popular with his novel Youth Without family, which earned him worldwide recognition among his works.
original: Hector Malot (1830-1907) est un écrivain français du XIXe siècle, apprécié grâce à son roman pour la jeunesse Sans famille, qui lui valut une reconnaissance mondiale parmi ses œuvres.
